description: {"blocks":[{"key":"7g95r","text":"Step by step protocol on how to book a cell sorter at EMBL's Flow Cytometry Core Facility","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"6j0f2","text":"Select one of the cell sorters that you want to book a slot","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2p38l","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9j5ha","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"anhij","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"image","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"height":182,"id":460815,"is_video":false,"legend":"{\"blocks\":null,\"entityMap\":null}","mime":"image/png","originalFile":{},"original_name":"image.png","placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/qcatcbah7.jpg","source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/qcarcbah7.jpg","type":1,"webp_placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/qcascbah7.webp","webp_source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/qcaqcbah7.webp","width":550}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5ljfl","text":"Use the options to move between weeks to find the desired date for your sorting","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"15nk5","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d1mn8","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"bl9s6","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7thjd","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"image","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"height":110,"id":460819,"is_video":false,"legend":"{\"blocks\":null,\"entityMap\":null}","mime":"image/png","originalFile":{},"original_name":"image.png","placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/qcaxcbah7.jpg","source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/qcavcbah7.jpg","type":1,"webp_placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/qcawcbah7.webp","webp_source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/qcaucbah7.webp","width":550}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5o6gl","text":"The calendar is colour coded:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"co1ga","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bjivk","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"deask","text":"Dark grey: Not available for booking","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":10}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"aav48","text":"You will find this colour:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dgt1k","text":"If you are not a novice (not a trained user), the over working and weekend hours slots will not be available for booking","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"583dc","text":"If you are trying to book the instrument with less than 48 hours until the time of the appointment.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"coml","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b86gl","text":"Light blue: Intervention (not available for booking)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":12}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"eqn5c","text":"This one highlights periods in which the instrument is blocked for scheduled interventions (such as a sorter bi-weekly aseptic cleaning) or for when the staff is not available to support the sorting (in such occasion, trained users might still have the opportunity to sort - please let us know).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e5jae","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e4ms5","text":"*Notice that the instrument is blocked for the staff lunch period from 12:00-13:00 and it is also the period in which the staff has more time to change the nozzle between sessions.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f4m2h","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b1pvu","text":"Teal: Booked session that still has to be confirmed","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":6}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"59v6","text":"Blue: Staff confirmed the session","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":5}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"acjt1","text":"Green: Staff confirmed the session for Operator Free (trained) users","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":6}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3kqsj","text":"Purple border: Session contains a comment to convey a special environment (such as 384 wp sorting)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":14}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3l6dt","text":"Light grey: available slots for booking","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":12}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"image","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"height":337,"id":460823,"is_video":false,"legend":"{\"blocks\":null,\"entityMap\":null}","mime":"image/png","originalFile":{},"original_name":"image.png","placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/qca3cbah7.jpg","source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/qcazcbah7.jpg","type":1,"webp_placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/qca2cbah7.webp","webp_source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/qcaycbah7.webp","width":550}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bmpif","text":"A form will be shown for you to fill the information regarding your sorting. Once you are done, click on \"Complete Booking\"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c5k56","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4abla","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"c02sq","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6ftee","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"image","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"height":289,"id":460827,"is_video":false,"legend":"{\"blocks\":null,\"entityMap\":null}","mime":"image/png","originalFile":{},"original_name":"image.png","placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/qca7cbah7.jpg","source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/qca5cbah7.jpg","type":1,"webp_placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/qca6cbah7.webp","webp_source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/qca4cbah7.webp","width":550}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6nmmj","text":"To book a slot:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"al8v4","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9671v","text":"Select time slot by checking the 30 minutes segments boxes in the calendar","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7kq9s","text":"(Optional) If you are trained, check the \"Operator Free\" Box. If you want to add a comment to your booking check the \"Comment\" box.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7jd6v","text":"Click on Book the selected sessions","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1e0lu","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"2ps72","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"96c3n","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a4foo","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"image","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"height":247,"id":460831,"is_video":false,"legend":"{\"blocks\":null,\"entityMap\":null}","mime":"image/png","originalFile":{},"original_name":"image.png","placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/qcbbcbah7.jpg","source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/qca9cbah7.jpg","type":1,"webp_placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/qcbacbah7.webp","webp_source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/qca8cbah7.webp","width":550}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"i7bl","text":"Your newly booked slot should appear in the calendar!","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6lspq","text":"The facility staff will then check and either confirm it directly, or if any issues arise you will be contacted for changes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"94vkl","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"2fo3t","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"image","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"height":233,"id":460835,"is_video":false,"legend":"{\"blocks\":null,\"entityMap\":null}","mime":"image/png","originalFile":{},"original_name":"image.png","placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/qcbfcbah7.jpg","source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/qcbdcbah7.jpg","type":1,"webp_placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/qcbecbah7.webp","webp_source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/qcbccbah7.webp","width":550}}}}
